page.title: 14The Clachanturn Ghost
page.content: Three hundred years ago the Laird of Abergeldie acted as judge at the trial of a local maidservant accused of being a witch. Her name was Katie Rankie. She was held in the dungeon under the castle. After the trial she was killed at a place called Creag nam Ban. Her head was chopped off. Her ghost is said to wander Abergeldie Forest searching for her head and screaming. I live beside Abergeldie Forest at a place called Clachanturn farmhouse I have not seen Katie Rankie haunting but I do believe in ghosts. It is very creepy walking in the woods alone at night. The barns are half falling down and there is the carcass of a rabbit lying on the ground.
